name: Eradicate (PattyHoswell)
description:
An RTS strategy side-scroller like the old school flash game such as Paladog. Miragine War and Stick War.

The game can be played for pc or android. But the main focus is pc on resolution 1920x1080 so it might have bug on android, Please report any bug if you encounter it and feedback is welcome..

I also have a discord server if you want to hangout or just looking around! https://discord.gg/fvUn5GVFv9
